reviews.text: A relaxing lunch in the sun with beach views and welcome and friendly service.

El Bobo is located right by the beach, offering amazing views of the sea. Some would regard these as ‘tourist traps’, but all I can say is that we experienced good service and food. Did like the white table cloths, which makes it feel a bit more special. It is located at the end of stretch, so is a bit quieter.

The prices are good and a lot like the other places in the area. We ordered a mix paella for two (rabbit, chicken and seafood) and it was delicious. The lunch was finished off with a complimentary vodka lemon sorbet.

On an earlier visit, I had a simple grilled hake.
We visited the sea side for some lunch. To start we had the garlic prawns which were amazing, so flavoursome. For the main she shared paella mixta which was delicious. I would definitely recommend.

Authentic Valenciana cuisine. The location is amazing, it’s right by the beautiful sandy beach of Valencia. For a great Paella (rabbit, chicken or meat), a good wine (san Miguel) and an amazing service you should try this place.
El Bobo got recommended to us by a friend from Valencia and I must say she was right. The food is excellent! Fresh sea food, local food. It gets busy so it´s best to reserve a table.
